ForearmsLVReverseWristCurlPL.name: Lever Reverse Wrist Curl (plate loaded)
ForearmsLVReverseWristCurlPL.preparation: Grasp bar with overhand grip. Place forearm on padded platform.
ForearmsLVReverseWristCurlPL.execution: Raise bar until wrist is fully hyperextended and return until wrist is fully flexed. Repeat.
ForearmsLVReverseWristCurlPL.comments: Some units, as one illustrated above, may be placed on sturdy table top or on floor. Keep forearm flat on padded platform throughout exercise.
